tender.title: Repair renovation works in the Bunglow No.2 at M.G. Road, Guwahati (Construction of Guest house, anti termite works inside the Bunglow, water proofing works, wood works shed in front of back verandah, repairing of all drain, w.s. sanitary fittings)
